name: Favorite Mods
description: Add installed Geode mods as your favorites!

issues.info: Report any issues to our repository!

enabled-required.name: Only Show Enabled Mods
enabled-required.description: Only list mods that you have enabled on your client.

minimal.name: Minimalist List
minimal.description: Show only important details of a mod in the favorites list.

auto-scroll.name: Automatically Scroll Up
auto-scroll.description: Snap the scoll area to the top when toggling favorites.

refresh-clear-search.name: Clear Search on Refresh
refresh-clear-search.description: Clear the search box when refreshing the mod list.

settings-btn.name: Mod Settings Button
settings-btn.description: Create a quick mod settings button in the favorites pop-up.

alerts.name: Error Alerts
alerts.description: Show alert pop-ups when errors occur.
